sentences.english: Do you think matches striking causes pineapple to fall.
sentences.chinese: 你們認爲劃火柴導致菠蘿掉下？

sentences.english: I"d like a pineapple pie and some cola."
sentences.chinese: 我要一個菠蘿派和一杯可樂。

sentences.english: Add onion, pineapple into soup first, then add tomato and bacha.
sentences.chinese: 先於湯中加入洋蔥及菠蘿，再加入番茄及白霞。

sentences.english: Sure, i'd like a pineapple juice, also, a boiled egg and tea and toast, please.
sentences.chinese: 可以，我要一杯菠蘿汁，一個水煮蛋，土司和茶。

sentences.english: Sorry. We don't have any pineapple pies right now. Would you like to order something else?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，菠蘿派現在沒有了。您能換個別的嗎？

sentences.english: Will this have any effect on when Blizzard will announce the next Diablo game?
sentences.chinese: 當玻璃渣發佈新的大菠蘿遊戲時，會不會有什麼影響？

sentences.english: We set a silver tray and decked it with a pineapple.
sentences.chinese: 我們在銀盤子上放一隻菠蘿。

sentences.english: Add in pineapple dices and blend to mix.
sentences.chinese: 接着加入菠蘿丁拌勻成餡料。

sentences.english: If like, sweetmeats can have caramel pineapple group.
sentences.chinese: 假如喜歡甜品可以喫焦糖菠蘿圈。

sentences.english: British prime minister Gordon Brown prefers pineapple chicken.
sentences.chinese: 英國首相布朗喜食“菠蘿雞”。

sentences.english: Had we wanted pineapples and ice cream, we would have gone to Florida.
sentences.chinese: 要是我們想喫菠蘿和冰淇淋，儘管可以去佛羅里達。

sentences.english: Watermelon juice might be just as good as pineapple.
sentences.chinese: 西瓜汁可能和菠蘿一個味道。

sentences.english: Tea polyphenols had influences on the properties of bromelain.
sentences.chinese: 酚菠蘿蛋白酶特性影響。

sentences.english: Spicy Chicken Combo and two pineapple pies, please.
sentences.chinese: 一個麥辣雞腿套餐和兩個菠蘿派。

sentences.english: Clarification of pineapple juice by present clarifier methods has some limitations.
sentences.chinese: 採用澄清劑法澄清菠蘿汁，存在缺陷。

definition: thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
above/on top of/on the surface of
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
